It is important to promote transparency through legal and ethical means that uphold the safety and well-being of all individuals involved.

I disagree with the idea of integrating politics and religion in governance. While both play important roles in society, intertwining the two can lead to division, discrimination, and the imposition of beliefs on individuals who may not share them. A government should remain neutral in matters of religion to ensure equal treatment for all citizens. By keeping politics and religion separate, we can create a more inclusive and tolerant society where individuals are free to practice their own faith without interference.
